com.nordicid.nurapi

Class NurCustomHopTableEx

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nordicid.nurapi.NurCustomHopTableEx

  • public class NurCustomHopTableEx
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds information about custom hop table.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NurCustomHopTableEx

        public NurCustomHopTableEx()
        Constructor used for extended custom hoptable reading. Do not use!

      • NurCustomHopTableEx

        public NurCustomHopTableEx(int[] freqs,
                   int chTime,
                   int pauseTime,
                   int lf,
                   int Tari,
                   int lbtThresh,
                   int TxLevel)
                    throws NurApiException
        Extended custom hop table constructor. Adds LBT threshold and maximum TX level.
        Parameters:
        freqs - Frequencies.
        chTime - Channel time.
        pauseTime - Idle time between channel change if any.
        lf - Maximum link frequency.
        Tari - Tari definition; 1 = 12.5 and 2 = 25us.
        lbtThresh - LBT threshold if used (0 = not used). Minimum value is -90.
        TxLevel - Maximum TX level as in (27 - TXLevel)dBm. Range is 0...19.
        Throws:
        NurApiException
